script: Ever wonder how your phone predicts your next word? That’s a neural network at work! Imagine your brain learning to guess the next word in a sentence—like predicting ‘dog’ after ‘fetch’—but way faster. Neural networks use layers of simple math to spot patterns in text, making them smarter than old-school word-guessing tools. Why does it matter? They power everything from autocorrect to chatbots, making tech more intuitive. So next time your phone nails your typo, thank a neural network!
